issue.title: Pricing page small enhancements
issue.body:
**Original author :** Blatti Yves

We'd like to make some enhancements on the pricing page to ease it's usage by users:
* Move pricing profiles on top of the page (most used part of page)
* Split globals pricing params in two titles :
** Fixed fees by order
** Internal orders

**Fixed versions :** 4.4.3

comments.body:
**Original author :** Van Hoecke Hélène 

Accepted by TC as it is.
